basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: A highly skilled and versatile professional with a Bachelor's degree in Informatics, proficient in software development and automation. Passionate about analytical problem-solving and collaborating in team environments to deliver efficient solutions.

courses: Building a modern fullstack web application (Thesis)

awards.title: 1st Place Innovation Contest
awards.summary: Won first place for developing Otis, a JavaScript-based templating software that automated form-filling and email generation

projects.name: defender-bot
projects.description: A Python-controlled LEGO Mindstorms Micropython robot from university, demonstrating experience with robotics, sensors, and OOP principles.
